data.title: Roberta Taylor
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Roberta Taylor on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text: Roberta Taylor worked on a variety of projects during her early entertainment career, including "Inspector Morse, Series II" (PBS, 1988-89) and "The Witches" with Anjelica Huston (1990). Taylor also appeared in "Tom & Viv" (1994) starring Willem Dafoe , "The Englishman Who Went Up A Hill But Came Down A Mountain" with Hugh Grant (1995) and "MIT: Murder Investigation Team" (A&E Network, 2002-05). More recently, Taylor appeared in "Bleak House" (2005-06). Roberta Taylor died on July 6, 2024 at the age of 76.
